product_name: REI Lite-Core 1.5 Self-Inflating Pad - Short - 2010 Special Buy
long_description: The REI Lite-Core 1.5 in. self-inflating, short-length, ultracompact pad takes up little space in your pack and won't weigh you down. X-Core foam insulation is cross-cored for maximum compressibility and weight reduction. Quick-closing, high-volume airflow valve allows the pad to inflate and deflate quickly. Rugged Taslan(R) nylon diamond-ripstop top surface has a nonslip texture; 75-denier polyester bottom surface resists wear. Grippy silicone pattern on upper surface helps keep sleeping bag from sliding off pad. Short length and low-volume, tapered, mummy-shape design increase efficiency and compressibility. R-Value equals 3.2. Stuff sack (included) protects pad during transport and ensures a compact parcel every time. Special buy.
